Posts.Content: I feel the same. I hate those ads. They're on everyday. Mets to liver 1 1/2 years ago. Ibrance did not work for me. I love it when they say "That's the new normal". Sorry I want my old normal. Now on Xeloda, 3rd cycle. Will have scan next month. Best wishes to you all. This is very hard! Thank goodness we have each other to bounce things off of.
Posts.Title: Commercials for Ibrance, etc.
